content:
User: I just sent him your last one that was pretty similar. Maybe I'll just send him the business concept long form in an attachment that includes ChatGPT, Gemini and your responses? And you can just emphasize that in the message along with kind of where I'm at and your assessment on that. I think I need a CEO right now that really understands that there are big visions out there, but that it needs to keep focused and keep me focused on the MVP for now and that once that is set up, we'll be able to start digging back into the big ideas? Decide and I'll do it. GO!

Grok: Thoughts
